ghathana siddhiyakata adhi chodana laba wideshayaka sangawa siti hitapu polis lokka baraweyi migamuwa samuha - wimal kirthi pudgalayaku pahara gena gos wedi thaba mara damima saha ema sirura sangawimata katayuthu kirima sambandhayen migamuwa mahadhikaranaya hamuwe adhichodana laba adhikaranaya mangahara wasara hathak wideshayaka sangawa sitiyadi athadanguwata ganimata jathyanthara polisiya (intapol) magin warenthu nikuth kara thibiyadi wasara hathakata pasu adhikaranayata bharawu sahakara polis adhikariwarayakuwa siti don indrajith priyal baranage (60) namaththata apa labadima prathikshepa kala migamuwa mahadhikarana winisuru shiran gunarathna mahatha ema withthikaru sapthambar masa 13 wani dina dakwa rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kirimata niyoga kaleya. 1995 sapthambar masa 27 wanida paminilla nodath aya samanga ek wi mohomad ibutha ali namathi wyaparikaya pahara gena yama ohuta pamunugama pradeshayedi wedi thaba ghathanaya kirima saha ema malasirura sangawimata katayuthu kirima sambandhayen withthikaru wu hitapu sahakara polis adhikariwaraya chodana laba atha.

me sakakaruwan samaga manik harimata upayogi karagath illamkuru, manik garana kuda, sawal kipayakda adhikaranaya hamuwata pamunuwa thibuni.niyan saya hethuwen pathulatama hindi athi kanthale maha wawen me dinawala wishala washayen manik hamuwimata patan gena athi bawin pradeshawasinta amatharawa pita palathwalin da piris pamina manik ahindinnata patangena atha.dinakata thun haradahasaka pirisak wawa godawi athi waw pitiye angili thuduwalin, kotu kaliwalin manik soya baluwada samahara piris illankuru, sawal yanadiya upayogi kara ganimin wawata barapathala lesa hani sidu kara thibe.mulasthana polis sthanadhipathi pra.po.pa .thennakona mahathage upades pita dushana mardana anshaye u.po.pa. arunapola, po.sawarun wana upali, jayarathna, po.ko.waranwana jayarathna, jayathilaka, ambaagala, gamini, sisira niladharihu watalima kara thibuni.
me lipi pelath dan awasanayi.
